item.title: Stop link rot with Linkwarden
item.description: 9/22/2025 TLDR: Linkwarden preserves your bookmarks into its database so that even if its deleted you still have a copy.

item.title: Homelab
item.description: Introduction Last updated on: 9/18/2025 I have been tinkering with my homelab since 2017 when over that summer I built a new computer.

item.title: Projects & Experiments
item.description: This page is almost redundant due to the fact that I discuss in great detail my projects and experiments on the Blog section of this site.

item.title: Automation & Scripting
item.description: Tock Archivist 9/18/2025 A few years ago I found an amazing project on GitHub called Tube Archivist.

item.title: Core Services
item.description: The purpose of this page is for me to discuss the services that I have deployed and are now a critical part of my daily life.

item.title: Infrastructure Overview
item.description: This page discusses the hardware (servers, storage, networking gear, virtualization hosts), Virtualization (VMware, Proxmox, Hyper-V, Docker, Kubernetes), Storage (RAID/ZFS, NAS, backup strategy), and Networking (firewalls, VLANs, NAT, VPN, reverse proxy).

item.title: Challenges & Lessons Learned
item.description: I have been tinkering with my server since 2017. In that time I have learned a lot of lessons the hard way.
